sourcesContent: import withConfigTransport from '../../services/config-transport/withConfigTransport' import VaBreadcrumbs from './VaBreadcrumbs.vue' import VaBreadcrumbsItemBase from './VaBreadcrumbsItem/VaBreadcrumbsItem.vue' export const VaBreadcrumbsItem = withConfigTransport(VaBreadcrumbsItemBase) export default withConfigTransport(VaBreadcrumbs)
